name: Chocolate Cake with Raspberries
steps: ½ c. water *1 bag semi-­‐sweet chocolate chips
½ c. oil (not in the original recipe)
Mix together and bake in greased bundt pan 50-­‐55 minutes at 350 degrees. (I've found this gives the cake
softer edges). The orginal reciped called for a bake time of 45 minutes at 375 degrees. You can see which
you prefer. Serve with chocolate glaze or homemade whipped cream and raspberries.
Melt 4 oz. coarsely chopped semisweet chocolate and 3 T butter over low heat, stirring frequently.
Remove from heat. Beat in 1 ½ c. sifted powdered sugar and 3 T hot water until smooth. Add additional hot
hot water, if needed, to reach drizzling consistency. Once the cake has cooled, drizzle glaze over the top.
